disclaimers: This communication is for informational purposes only, and is not intended for distribution to potential borrowers.
The above rates are current as of Friday, 3/21/2025. All rates and programs are subject to change or cancellation at any time, and without notice.
The content on this website does not represent a loan approval or a commitment to lend.
All rates based on 740 FICO score, 20% down and 0.5 points. Conventional rates are based on a $647,000 purchase price.
FHA/VA based on $500,000 purchase price, 25% down payment.
FHA/VA based on max allowable LTV based on the $500,000 loan amount.
$1,000,000 purchase price with 35% down for jumbo rates.
Bank statement and DSCR based on $1,000,000 price with 25% down.
DSCR assumes a 2-year prepayment penalty agreement.
Interest rates may only be locked by a licensed Loan Officer.
Actual fees and costs may vary based on your specific loan transaction.
